TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void GotPageSizeHandler(object o, GotPageSizeArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed GotPageSizeHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the GotPageSizeHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the GotPageSizeHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the GotPageSizeHandler is removed from the event.
